HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 3,50 eura za narudžbe ispod 55 eura. Besplatno za narudžbe iznad 55 eura.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Maksimalno 48 sati od preuzimanja pošiljke (ne računajući vikende i praznike). Za otoke, maksimalno 72 sata.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na otoke traje duže (do 72 sata), ali nema spomena o dodatnoj naplati.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Nije specificirano, vjerojatno se primjenjuje standardna cijena dostave.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: 2 eura za narudžbe ispod 55 eura. Besplatno za narudžbe iznad 55 eura.

weekend_delivery.days: Radno vrijeme za preuzimanje je od ponedjeljka do petka, 7:00 - 15:00.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.cod_surcharge: Plaćanje pouzećem nije moguće kod osobnog preuzimanja.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Hoću knjigu offers home delivery, parcel locker delivery, and in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Delivery partners are GLS, DPD, and Box Now. PRICING: Home delivery costs €3.50 (free for orders over €55). Parcel locker delivery is €2.00 (free over €55). In-store pickup is free. RESTRICTIONS: Delivery to islands takes longer (up to 72h). Weekend delivery is not available. Cash on delivery is an option for home delivery but not for in-store pickup; no surcharge is mentioned. NOTABLE FEATURES: Customers receive detailed email/SMS notifications for tracking and can manage their delivery (e.g., change address). Same-day parcel locker delivery is available for Zagreb. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive and clearly located on a dedicated page. It details providers, costs, delivery times, and various options. Information on potential COD or island surcharges is not explicitly stated.
